cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to an invalid hex format (0xZZZ) will cause parsing failure and gNB identification errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to an out-of-range value (1000) will cause invalid bandwidth configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為超出範圍的值 (1000)，會導致無效的頻寬配置，並造成小區設定失敗。
